title: Rebuild Girly Self Care app from HTML source with complete implementation

requirements.summary: Parse and implement the complete HTML app structure from the user-provided source code, preserving all sections, styling patterns, and interaction behaviors
acceptanceCriteria: All sections defined in the HTML source are implemented as React components
CSS styling from the HTML <style> block is converted to Tailwind classes or custom CSS matching the original visual design
All JavaScript functionality from the HTML source is implemented in React hooks and components
The app structure and navigation flow matches the HTML implementation

file_operations.description: Refactor the main App component to match the HTML source structure, implementing the section-based navigation system where only one section is visible at a time. Replace the current screen-based navigation with the HTML's section display logic. Preserve the existing MusicControl and DarkModeToggle components while integrating them into the new layout.

Update the opening screen to match the greeting and introduction content from the HTML source. Ensure the layout, text content, and navigation button match the original HTML implementation while using React components.

Rebuild the menu screen to match the HTML source's navigation structure. Update button labels, layout, and styling to align with the original HTML menu section. Ensure all navigation options from the HTML are represented.

Update the todo card component to match the exact styling, interaction patterns, and localStorage implementation from the HTML source. Ensure the task creation, completion toggling, and persistence logic matches the original.
Update the notes card to match the HTML source implementation, ensuring textarea styling, save functionality, and localStorage persistence align with the original behavior.
Update the reminders card to match the HTML source's reminder buttons, notification triggers, and interaction patterns. Ensure all reminder options from the HTML are implemented.

Update the bubble game to match the HTML source's game mechanics, bubble spawning logic, tap interactions, and scoring system. Ensure visual styling and sound effects align with the original implementation.
Implement the daily quote functionality from the HTML source. Add the quote display logic, quote rotation mechanism, and styling to match the original HTML implementation.

requirements.summary: Apply Comic Sans MS font family throughout the app to maintain the cute, friendly aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Comic Sans MS is loaded and applied as the primary font
A fallback cursive font is provided for systems without Comic Sans MS

file_operations.description: Update the CSS base layer to include Comic Sans MS as the primary font-family with cursive as fallback. Apply the font globally to the body and all text elements to match the HTML source's font specification.
Extend the Tailwind theme configuration to set Comic Sans MS with cursive fallback as the default font family. This ensures all Tailwind utility classes use the correct font.

requirements.summary: Implement the exact gradient background from HTML source: linear gradient from #ffc0cb to #ff99cc, top-left to bottom-right
acceptanceCriteria: Background gradient matches the HTML source colors exactly
Gradient direction is top-left to bottom-right
Background covers the entire viewport without horizontal scrolling

file_operations.description: Add the exact background gradient specification from the HTML source to the body element. Use the linear-gradient(to bottom right, #ffc0cb, #ff99cc) with appropriate viewport coverage settings. Ensure the gradient is applied globally and does not cause horizontal scrolling.

Update the root container styling to ensure the gradient background is properly displayed. Remove any conflicting background styles and ensure the app container allows the global gradient to show through.

requirements.summary: Implement section display logic where sections are hidden by default and shown individually based on navigation state
acceptanceCriteria: Only one section is visible at a time
Each section has consistent padding of 50px vertical and 20px horizontal
Sections have appropriate minimum height as defined in the HTML source

file_operations.description: Implement the section visibility logic from the HTML source where all sections start hidden (display:none equivalent) and only the active section is shown. Use React state to track the current section and conditionally render only the active section.

Update the feature screen shell to apply the consistent padding (50px vertical, 20px horizontal) and minimum height from the HTML source. Ensure the layout wrapper matches the HTML's section styling specifications.

Add utility classes or base styles for section containers that implement the padding and minimum height specifications from the HTML source. Ensure these styles can be applied consistently across all section components.

requirements.summary: Extract and implement all interactive features, content, and user flows defined in the complete HTML source code
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons, inputs, and interactive elements from the HTML are functional
All content sections (greetings, instructions, feature areas) are rendered
Navigation between screens works as defined in the HTML
All event handlers and dynamic behaviors are preserved

file_operations.description: Implement all navigation flows and event handlers from the HTML source. Ensure all sections can be navigated to and from, and that the navigation state management matches the HTML's JavaScript implementation. Wire up all interactive elements with their corresponding handlers.
Implement all buttons, text content, and interactive elements from the HTML source's opening section. Ensure event handlers for navigation and any dynamic content updates are functional.
Implement all navigation buttons and interactive elements from the HTML source's menu section. Ensure each button properly triggers navigation to its corresponding feature section.

Implement all interactive elements from the HTML source's todo section, including input fields, add buttons, checkbox interactions, and delete functionality. Ensure all event handlers work as defined in the original JavaScript.

Implement all interactive elements from the HTML source's notes section, including textarea input, save button, and any dynamic content display. Ensure event handlers match the original implementation.
Implement all reminder buttons and notification triggers from the HTML source. Ensure each reminder type has the correct event handler and notification behavior as defined in the original JavaScript.

Implement all interactive game elements from the HTML source, including bubble spawning, tap/click handlers, sound effects, and score tracking. Ensure the game loop and event handlers match the original implementation.
Implement all content display and any interactive elements (refresh button, quote navigation) from the HTML source's quote section. Ensure the quote rotation and display logic matches the original.

Verify the music control component matches any audio controls defined in the HTML source. Update play/pause/mute functionality and UI styling to align with the original implementation if different from current version.
Verify the dark mode toggle matches any theme switching functionality in the HTML source. Update to preserve the light/dark theme system while ensuring it works with the new gradient background.
